original: 東吳將領。從陸遜參與夷陵之戰，劉備兵敗退守白帝城後，宋謙曾上表要求追擊劉備。但陸遜等人顧慮曹魏趁機伐吳，否決宋謙提議。此後事跡未見於史策。
text: Soochow generals. After Lu Xun participated in the Battle of Yiling and Liu Bei was defeated and retreated to Baidi City, Song Qian asked to pursue Liu Bei. But Lu Xun and others worried that Cao Wei would take the opportunity to defeat Wu and rejected Song Qian's proposal. Deeds since then have not been seen in Shi Ce.
